A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Disappointing.  Character development is OUT in action blockbusters\, and critics don't seem to mind.  Like The Force Awakens\, the movie is bizarrely paced (I'm fairly certain less than 3 days have passed from the beginning of The Force Awakens to the end of The Last Jedi) and is filled with the kind of inexplicable\, pointless diversions that made Episodes 1-3 so unwatchable (see Casino Planet).  You do care more about Rey and Ren than in the Force Awakens\, but beyond that virtually every character --including Luke and Leia -- feels shallow and expendable.  Still unclear what the First Order is\, where it came from\, and what they're fighting for.
